xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 07 May 2013
xwikidoc.content: <phenotips_org> has joined #ccm 04:03 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 08:24 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 08:51 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 09:51 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:04 <krinye> has joined #ccm 10:09 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 10:11 <lakhanpandya> has joined #ccm 10:19 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 10:27 <sdumitriu1> has joined #ccm 10:36 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 10:45 <sdumitriu1> Hey, who wants to fix a small issue? 11:14 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: Hey 11:14 <kushalkhandelwal> What issue ? 11:14 <sdumitriu1> #442 11:15 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok 11:15 <kushalkhandelwal> WIll check that 11:15 <kushalkhandelwal> After dinner 11:16 <kushalkhandelwal> Applied for slots ? 11:17 <sdumitriu1> Yep 11:18 <kushalkhandelwal> Hm Ok :) 11:19 <sdumitriu1> We'll see tomorrow what we get 11:20 <kushalkhandelwal> How many you applied for ? 11:20 <sdumitriu1> 5-9 11:24 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 11:24 <kushalkhandelwal> you have to give a range ? 11:24 <sdumitriu1> Yes 11:24 <kushalkhandelwal> Does it depend on the number of mentors ? 11:25 <sdumitriu1> Yes 11:29 <kushalkhandelwal> So in total 4 mentors for CCM ? 11:39 <sdumitriu1> 10 11:45 <kushalkhandelwal> 10 mentors 11:45 <sdumitriu1> Yep 11:45 <kushalkhandelwal> Then you should get easily 12:18 <sdumitriu1> Wait, 11 12:38 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 12:56 <sdumitriu1> Hey BogdanVancea 13:09 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 13:09 <BogdanVancea> hello, sdumitru1 13:10 <BogdanVancea> weird thing happened to the irc, I couldn't see what I've written :) 13:40 <BogdanVancea_> has joined #ccm 13:56 <BogdanVancea_> hello, sdumitriu1 13:57 <BogdanVancea_> I kept getting disconnected. I'm not sure if I missed anything you said. 14:01 <ravigarg27> has joined #ccm 14:10 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #ccm 14:10 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: Hey 14:10 <kushalkhandelwal> Not able to reproduce that bug 14:21 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 14:51 <sdumitriu1> Back 14:52 <sdumitriu1> Hm, so we only have 2 slots 14:54 <BogdanVancea> welcome back 14:54 <BogdanVancea> I thought there were more slots :( 14:54 <sdumitriu1> I didn't say anything, just Hello 14:54 <BogdanVancea> ah 14:54 <sdumitriu1> How are you? 14:55 <BogdanVancea> good, finishing up some tests for my Bachelor project 14:55 <sdumitriu1> We might get more 14:55 <BogdanVancea> and you? 14:55 <sdumitriu1> We might get more slots 14:55 <kushalkhandelwal> Hm, so we only have 2 slots ???? 14:55 <sdumitriu1> Well, a bit disapointed 14:55 <kushalkhandelwal> Slots released ? 14:57 <BogdanVancea> yeah, too bad 14:57 <BogdanVancea> there are a lot of interesting possible projects 14:57 <kushalkhandelwal> BogdanVancea: Slots released ? 14:57 <kushalkhandelwal> And only 2 ? 14:58 <BogdanVancea> kushalkahndelwal, sdumitriu1 just said 14:58 <BogdanVancea> there are only 2 slots available 14:58 <BogdanVancea> I don't have much information 14:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm 15:00 <sdumitriu1> Now, since I'm the org admin for XWiki, and XWiki got 4 slots and we're not going to need them, I can transfer two slots to CCM 15:03 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 15:03 <kushalkhandelwal> you can do that 15:04 <kushalkhandelwal> XWiki got 4 15:04 <kushalkhandelwal> How many you applied for ? 15:04 <kushalkhandelwal> From #gsoc 15:04 <kushalkhandelwal> <@carols> manugupt1_: it's a first come first serve basis unless the org giving back the slots specifies what org for it to go to 15:05 <sdumitriu1> XWiki applied for 2-4 15:05 <sdumitriu1> We got all that we requested 15:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice 15:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Strange they gave only 2 to CCM 15:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Is it because the org is new ? 15:06 <sdumitriu1> Which is normal, since XWiki is a veteran organization with a very good record 15:06 <sdumitriu1> Yes, probably because it's new 15:06 <BogdanVancea> I see 15:06 <kushalkhandelwal> You spoke to someone from google open source office ? 15:06 <sdumitriu1> About what? 15:06 <kushalkhandelwal> About slots 15:06 <kushalkhandelwal> Why so low 15:07 <kushalkhandelwal> As in there was a case with Octave , they didn;t get selected 15:07 <sdumitriu1> No 15:07 <kushalkhandelwal> so they were told that it is better they work under GNU 15:07 <kushalkhandelwal> and they would be given more slots for Octave under GNU 15:09 <BogdanVancea> sdumitriu1, you said CCM could get more slots? 15:09 <BogdanVancea> were you talking about the slots you can transfer? 15:09 <BogdanVancea> or can Google award more slots?* 15:09 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes , he was talking about transfer 15:10 <kushalkhandelwal> For google to award 15:10 <sdumitriu1> 2 from transfer, but there's also a pool of slots that will be distributed to other organizations 15:10 <kushalkhandelwal> Org can apply for waiting list 15:11 <sdumitriu1> I wonder where to do that... 15:12 <kushalkhandelwal> ping carols on #gsoc 15:12 <sdumitriu1> OK, I found the instructions 15:22 <BogdanVancea> has joined #ccm 15:51 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 16:50 <BogdanVancea> well, I'm off 16:50 <BogdanVancea> good night guys :) 16:50 <kushalkhandelwal> Good night :) 20:07 <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 22:35 <kushalk124> has joined #ccm 22:53 <sdumitriu> Hey kushalk124
